Plots scree plot for PCA

Source: R/reduction.R
plotScree.Rd

Plots scree plot for PCA

plotScree(bank, lambda, M = 1)

Arguments

bank

BanksyObject

lambda

(numeric) spatial weighting parameter

M

(numeric) compute up to the k-th azimuthal fourier harmonic (default: 1)

Value

Scree plot

Examples

# Generate a simulated dataset
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
bank <- NormalizeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ScaleBanksy(bank)
bank <- ComputeBanksy(bank)
#> Computing neighbors...
#> Spatial mode is kNN median
#> Parameters: k_geom = 15
#> Done
#> Computing neighbors...
#> Spatial mode is kNN median
#> Parameters: k_geom = 15
#> Done
#> Computing harmonic m = 0
#> Using 15 neighbors
#> Done
#> Computing harmonic m = 1
#> Using 15 neighbors
#> Centering
#> Done
bank <- RunBanksyPCA(bank, lambda = 0.2)
#> Running PCA for M=1 lambda=0.2
#> BANKSY matrix with own.expr, F0, F1
#> Squared lambdas: 0.8, 0.1333, 0.0667
scree <- plotScree(bank, lambda = 0.2)
scree
